Original:
酒價格算便宜
但容量相對較少 而且酒精感覺不太烈 跟四五個朋友來喝酒的話這裡應該算不錯（就是說目的不是為了喝醉那種）
看到店裡蠻多客人是一大群來的
酒種類蠻多，還可以客製化！會根據你要的口味和價格去調，bartender很nice
現在四人打卡或六人打卡好像都有送東西哦～
另外講一下他們的招牌「奶油啤酒」我覺得好喝！奶油甜味濃 啤酒味不重 女生基本應該會蠻喜歡 但男生我就不知道了⋯
EN:
The price of wine is cheap
But the capacity is relatively small and the alcohol does not feel too strong to drink with four or five friends. This should be good here (that is, the purpose is not to get drunk)
Seeing a lot of guests in the store came from a large group
There are quite a lot of wines and can be customized!It will be adjusted according to the taste and price you want, Bartender is very nice
Now that the four people check in or six people, it seems that there are all things to send things ~
In addition, I think their signature "cream beer" I feel delicious!Cream Sweet Beer tastes not heavy. Girls should basically like it, but boys, I don’t know ...
